did.unittitle: Pennsylvania Mining Company vs United Mine Workers of America Court Records
did.abstract: Court documents from the Pennsylvania Mining Company's case against the United Mine Workers of America, brought before the United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of court documents from the Pennsylvania Mining Company's case against the United Mine Workers of America, brought before the United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. The case was first argued in the District Court for the Western District of Arkansas.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pennsylvania Mining Company vs. United Mine Workers of America Court Records #5358. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
